parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: The right part of the linear predictor function, that contains the indepedent variables in an equation supporting the symbols +, :, * , R notation.

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: The left part of the linear predictor function, that contains the dependent variable.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
